name: WinZip Registration File
summary: Learn about .WZMUL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: After the program has been registered, the file should be placed in the Windows Common Application Data folder. In Windows XP, the location is:
In Windows Vista, the location is:

description: Registration file used to register WinZip, a popular compression utility for Windows; may be downloaded from the WinZip website after purchasing a WinZip license; opening the WinZip.wzmul file initiates the WinZip registration process.
